name: Mini Fridge
description:
Mr L is an elderly client known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC). He is alone at home most of the time as he has weak lower limbs and is unable to walk long distances. 

THKMC is looking for a mini fridge for food storage.  

If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please Whatsapp Xin Yi at 8292 2214.

Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services.     

THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

name: XL Diapers (Pants)

name: 2 laptops
description: Client has 5 children. 3 children in pri sch and 2 children age 1 and 2. Hb is the sole breadwinner of the family earning 1.6k a month. Family is struggling financially due to sibling's debt especially. Client plans to work next year after approved subsidised student care. Pri sch only provides laptop loans at $200 each which family cant afford. 2 laptops for the elder children would help with their HBLs and defray additional cost for family.

name: Laptop
description: Client is unable to seek and sustain full-time employment as she is focusing on mental health recovery. However, she has started on home-based crafting to keep herself meaningfully engaged. A laptop will be helpful for her to seek out online resources and a supportive tool as she is keeping a look out for home-based jobs. She is currently on financial assistance and has limited family support.

name: Used laptop
description:
Client is a 60 year old man, caring for his wife who is currently receiving treatment for cancer. Client is a freelance worker and is currently unable to secure projects due to his caregiver role. 
Client's laptop broke down recently, and has affected his work.

name: Laptop with HDMI cable
description:
Client is a stage 4A Cervical Cancer patient. She is unemployed and has to financially support her two teenage children. Currently, she is heavily dependent on the social service agencies for financial assistance but she has also made several attempts to work on ad-hoc basis despite her poor health.  

Client’s washing machine and refrigerator are malfunctioned. Therefore, she hopes to get a new one so that she does not need to wash her clothes by hand and her fresh food could last longer, if kept in a refrigerator. She would also like to request for a laptop with HDMI cable as she is attending an online course now in order to secure a job.

name: Chest of drawers
description: Client is a mother of 4 children with a recent newborn baby. Client's current chest of drawer is breaking down. Client looking for a new or 2nd hand chest of drawers to keep her children's clothes. Donor to pay for delivery fees.

contact.name: Calyn Xu

name: Metal Dining Table
description: For seniors staying in 1-room rental unit.

contact.org: Montfort Care - Kreta Ayer Family Services
contact.name: Chua Pei Ching

name: TV Console
description:
This is a newlywed couple who are expecting their first child. 
After struggling to find a stable home, they are finally moving into their new rental flat. 
However, they are going through financial difficulties. 
Client is unable to afford the abovementioned item. 
Looking for a kind donor to help this family. 
Thank you.

name: One-seater sofa
description:
Client, age 45, is the only son whose father passed away 3 years ago. He quit his job for many years to take care of both his elderly parents. Currently he is the primary caregiver to his ailing mother, and is has his own medical conditions.

He is in need of a one-seater sofa as his is spoilt for many years and he does not have the ability to purchase a new one as he is on social support. Hoping for kind donation for a one-seater sofa for client.For further liaison, do contact Nurul via whatsapp at 98598767.

name: Kitchen Shelves/Cabinet
description:
This is a newlywed couple who are expecting their first child. 
After struggling to find a stable home, they are finally moving into their new rental flat. 
However, they are going through financial difficulties. 
Client is unable to afford the abovementioned items. 
Client is not particular with the items, but is in need of a bed soon as she is currently pregnant. 
Looking for a kind donor to help this family. 
Thank you.

name: Small pedestal drawer
description: A single elderly with multiple medical conditions just moved into HDB rental flat. He wishes to get a small pedestal drawer to keep his items and letters, as well as functioning as a small desk for him.

name: Round Dining table with 4 chairs
description: Client is a mother of 3 children(F/14,F/6,F/8) and unfit to work due to health concern and caregiving issue. Client’s husband is the sole breadwinner of the family of 5. Your kind blessing of the following items will ease the family's tight financial situation and allow them to better organise their space. The family deeply appreciates your great support. Thank you! (Xin mo)

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Storage rack
description: We have shifted to a sponsored storage space and we need a storage rack to put up our logistics as the space given is small. One storage rack is good enough with the above mentioned size.

name: Sliding door wardrobe
description: Single mother with three children requires a sliding door wardrobe (120cm length x 190cm tall) as theirs has spoilt. Sliding door preferred due to limited space in the 1 bedroom flat. She has just started work as a hawker assistant and does not have the means to buy a new wardrobe. Appreciate if donor can deliver.

name: Loft Bunk Bed
description: Single mother with 1 school-going daughter requires a loft bunk bed (something like https://www.ikea.com/sg/en/p/stora-loft-bed-frame-white-stain-70242086/) in order for the daughter to have space below to put a study desk for her studying, and for them to have sufficient sleeping space. They are staying in a small rental flat with 1 bedroom and would like to maximise the space. Single mother is working part-time and is unable to purchase a brand new bed. Appreciate if donor can deliver.

name: Kitchen cabinet
description: Client is unemployed due to medical condition. She was unable to secure stable employment previously due to ongoing medical issues. She is certified unfit for work for 6 months w.e.f. 15/10/2021. Client has just shifted to her new 1-room rental flat. Due to financial difficulties and limited financial resources, she is unable to afford the purchase of some household items and will benefit from donation.

name: Triple Decker bed
description:
Client and her children lives in a rental flat. At present, client is sharing a queen-sized bed with 2 of her daughters aged 7 and 6 and her 3-year old son. Her 8-year old son sleeps on a mattress on the floor. This greatly affects their quality of sleep due to space constrain. A triple decker bed will greatly increase the children's quality of life. 

I can be contacted via my work hp no. @80236342 or email smaheswari@amkfsc.org.sg

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: S Maheswari

name: Kitchen cabinet
description: Client is a young, single mother with a 1 month+ newborn. They are living in a rental flat with limited fmaily support. She's relying on welfare assistance while on maternity leave currently as her part-time job provides her with low wages and her savings are insufficient. Their kitchen cabinet is broken and she needs a replacement.

name: Board games
description: Family has 2 school going children, 13 years old and 9 years old and is currently facing financial difficulty. Therefore, there are unable to afford for things beyond their basic needs. The family is requesting for board games such as scrabble, uno and monopoly deal helps them to spend more time together as a family and also for children to have alternative activity instead of just playing computer games.

name: Bicycle
description: Family has 2 school going children and is currently facing financial difficulty. Therefore, there are unable to afford for things beyond their basic needs. The bicycle is for the 13 years old boy who enjoys cycling and he can cycle instead of playing computer games at home.

name: Android Tablet

Client is single and staying alone. He suffers from depression and anxiety and is unfit for work. 

Client has severe insomnia, needs an Android tablet (Wifi/LTE preferred) with large screen 8" to 9", good storage/battery life. (For emails, movies, games and reading).

name: Bicycle

Together, they have a 3 yo son, living in a rental flat with his aunt-in-law. 
Due to his medical condition, the family is on financial assistance. He has been seeking employment but to no avail.

name: Ebike Battery
description: A family of 3 with a 3yo child is requesting for an ebike battery. The current ebike battery does not last them very long. The battery that they are looking for is the Zebra Ebike 10AH Battery.

name: Nestle Lactogen 3
description: Family of 5 with 2 schooling children and 1 baby. Father on dialysis past 7 years, unable to earn much, resulting in debts. Mother trying to make ends meet. Having a milk powder supply would greatly alleviate the family's stress.

name: Milk Powder (Similac Stage 3)
description: Family of 7, with 5 children requires short-term milk powder support for the youngest son. Husband is the sole breadwinner and has unstable income due to his health condition. Wife is unable to work due to caregiving of her children and is currently pregnant.

name: NTUC Vouchers
description: Client is a 56 year old man with multiple health conditions and has since retired. He is facing financial strains and would require support to afford his groceries and household items.

name: Food Rations (Halal)
description: Client is a housewife who had recently separated from her husband. She is caring for her 4yr old daughter. The separation resulted in financial difficulties in challenges in meeting her and her daughter's basic needs such as food and diapers. Seeking donations for Halal certified frozen food such as nuggets, hotdogs. Food rations such as maggi (curry), cooking oil, Marigold UHT Packet Milk - Chocolate 1l. 10packets.

name: 10 tubs X 2.75kg of Planta Margarine
description: We are requesting for 10 tubs of 2.75kg of Planta Margarine for cooking use or meal for our residents from Monday to Saturday. The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premises.

name: Smart phone
description: Single mom with 6 kids (at 2 diff primary schools and 1 in sec school) requires handphone to stay in touch with them.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Bukit Batok
contact.name: Christina Lim

name: Wet wipes
description:
Patient is a 79 year old male who is married with a son. He requires assistance with his Activities of Daily Living (ADLs). Patient’s son is unemployed as he is the main caregiver for patient.
 
Patient requires the use of wet wipes on a regular basis for patient’s hygiene and upkeeping. On average, 1 pack can last around 1.5 weeks. The family has difficulty affording the ongoing medical consumables due to son’s unemployment. The item can be found here: https://shopee.sg/Hospicare-40R-Ultra-Soft-Adult-Body-Wipes--Carton--40-Sheets-x-15-Packets-i.27373250.943865490?utm_source=google&utm_medium=seller&utm_campaign=s27373250_ss_sg_gshp_gshpbyshopee-Nov21-freshening-adsellerate-dmpp_15342311656&is_seller=true&gclid=EAIaIQobChMI98f-t5zn9AIViH0rCh1eKgwTEAQYASABEgJHRfD_BwE (Shopee).

Kindly arrange for the donated items to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can WhatsApp Jia Ling at 82479135 for details. Thank you!

name: Transport support to school for student with special needs
description:
Family of 4 has a teenager with special needs. The family is on financial assistance. Due to teenager's unique mood issues, he has difficulty taking the school bus during his hyper moods. The family previously coped by taking private hire during teenager's hyper moods that occur every month for approximately 2 weeks. However, these fares take up a significant proportion of the family's income. 
Mother is a responsible lady who prioritises her children despite her several health conditions. She is also the full-time caregiver for the teenager with special needs.  
Transport support for the family would be very helpful in reducing the stressors for this family and will allow the teenager to continue to have access to school during his hyper moods.

name: Ensure Liquid (Strawberry Flavour)
description:
Patient is a 79 year old male who is married with a son. He requires assistance with his Activities of Daily Living (ADLs). Patient’s son is unemployed as he is the main caregiver for patient.
 
Patient was recommended by hospital to consume 2 cans of Ensure Liquid daily to supplement his diet. The family has difficulty affording the ongoing medical consumables due to son’s unemployment. 
The item can be found here: https://rehabmart.com.sg/nursing/nutrition/wellness-nutrition/ensure-liquid-strawberry (Rehab Mart) or https://www.pinkpharm.com/products/ensure-liquid-250ml?_pos=1&_sid=62c0a0f5d&_ss=r (PinkPharm). 

Kindly arrange for the donated items to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can WhatsApp Jia Ling at 82479135 for details. Thank you!

name: Cat foods and necessities
description: Family with children facing financial strains are caring for 10 cats. They would need some support to purchase necessities for the cats while we work with family to seek for adopters.

name: Oven (for baking)
description: Client is a family of 4 with 2 school going children. She has been feeling stressed over the family's financial situation and caregiving duties (1 child with special needs). Client loves to bake, and baking is an effective way for her to cope with her stress. However, she has stopped baking since her oven broke down a few months ago. She does not have the finances to purchase a new oven. Thus, a new/working oven would be beneficial for her.

contact.org: MWS Covenant Family Service Centre - Hougang
contact.name: Chan Jun Ren

name: Citravescent
description:
Patient is a 60 year old gentleman who is paralysed waist down. He has been unemployed since 2017 due to medical conditions and relies on his helper for his Activities of Daily Living (ADLs). Patient is receiving insurance payout, however is only sufficient to cover the helper fees and their daily expenditures.
He requires the use of citravescent three times a day due to his medical condition on a long-term basis, however is unable to afford them. The item can be found on Shopee: https://bit.ly/3pl1w04 or Lazada: https://bit.ly/3qYjSUW . You can also buy at any shops. Kindly arrange the donated items to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can contact Jia Ling at 82479135 via WhatsApp. Thank you.

name: Food rations

name: Dog leash and muzzle
description:
Client is currently unemployed and unable to afford a leash and muzzle for her dog who has stranger anxiety. Tend to attack when brought out for walks or when visitors are over. As such, she keeps her dog at home most of the time which affects the well-being of her dog as well. Having a leash and muzzle will benefit both the dog and client. Breed of dog: Jack Russel

Their fridge has broken down for a month and she has not been able to keep their food fresh or cold. A fridge would greatly support clt's ability to cook and provide food for her husband, 5 year old grand daughter and herself. Email or whatsapp @ 66901010.

description: Family has 4 school-going children, who requires packets of pre-cooked meals (Halal) urgently, as mother is unable to prepare all of their daily meals due to her recent slipped disc diagnosis. Father is the sole breadwinner.

name: Milk Powder
description: Single mother of 2 young children requires short-term milk powder support (lactogen 2&3). The mother is currently not working due to caregiving of her children and has lack of family support.

name: Induction cooker
description: Client is a 74 year old man who recently shifted from his shelter to a rental flat. Is currently unemployed due to health reasons and is looking for kitchenware (induction stove, pots and pans) to cook and save money from buying meals outside.

name: School Bag and Shoes
description:
Single mother with 2 children is medically unfit to work. She is seeking assistance to get school shoes for her children 10 and 6 years old.
Black school shoes Size 37 and 34. She is also hoping to get school bags for them. Client has medical condition and has limited mobility. This assistance will help her manage her preparation for her children. Thank you.

name: PCF Sparkletots Uniform (M-L size)
description: Low-income family with 2 young children (4 and 3 years old) needs a few sets of PCF Sparkletots Uniforms for their children to wear to preschool. They currently require a few more sets of uniform as the younger child is transitioning to a class which requires them to wear uniforms next year. Both parents have experienced disruptions in employment due to the COVID-19 pandemic, leading to a shortage in financial resources. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
